name: The Gift
summary_text: A fortune teller with extrasensory perception is asked to help find a young woman who has mysteriously disappeared.

name: Top Boy
summary_text: Two London drug dealers ply their lucrative trade at a public housing estate in East London.

name: The Nest
summary_text: Life for an entrepreneur and his American family begins to take a twisted turn after moving into an English country manor.

name: Lilo & Stitch
summary_text: A young and parentless girl adopts a 'dog' from the local pound, completely unaware that it's supposedly a dangerous scientific experiment that's taken refuge on Earth and is now hiding from its creator and those who see it as a menace.

name: Waiting for the Barbarians
summary_text: At an isolated frontier outpost, a colonial magistrate suffers a crisis of conscience when an army colonel arrives looking to interrogate the locals about an impending uprising, using cruel tactics that horrify the magistrate.

name: Glitch
summary_text: Six people return from the dead with no memory and attempt to unveil what brought them to the grave in the first place.

name: Capharnaüm
summary_text: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.

name: No Escape
summary_text: In their new overseas house, an American family soon finds themselves caught in the middle of a coup, and they frantically look for a safe escape from an environment where foreigners are being immediately executed.

name: Devs
summary_text: A computer engineer investigates the secretive development division in her company, which she believes is behind the disappearance of her boyfriend.

name: Limitless
summary_text: With the help of a mysterious pill that enables the user to access 100% of his brain's abilities, a struggling writer becomes a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with many dangers.

name: The Princess Diaries
summary_text: Mia Thermopolis has just found out that she is the heir apparent to the throne of Genovia. With her friends Lilly and Michael Moscovitz in tow, she tries to navigate through the rest of her sixteenth year.

name: Xena: Warrior Princess
summary_text: Xena, a mighty Warrior Princess with a dark past, sets out to redeem herself. She is joined by small town bard, Gabrielle. Together they journey the ancient world and fight for the greater good against ruthless Warlords and Gods.

name: The Highwaymen
summary_text: The untold true story of the legendary detectives who brought down Bonnie and Clyde.

name: Brave
summary_text: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida (Kelly Macdonald) defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.

name: House of Wax
summary_text: An associate burns down a wax museum with the owner inside, but he survives only to become vengeful and murderous.

name: Cry Macho
summary_text: A one-time rodeo star and washed-up horse breeder takes a job to bring a man's young son home and away from his alcoholic mom. On their journey, the horseman finds redemption through teaching the boy what it means to be a good man.

name: High School Musical
summary_text: A popular high-school athlete and an academically-gifted girl get roles in the school musical and develop a friendship that threatens East High's social order.

name: The Professor and the Madman
summary_text: Professor James Murray begins work compiling words for the first edition of the Oxford English Dictionary in the mid-19th century, and receives over 10,000 entries from a patient at Broadmoor Criminal Lunatic Asylum, Dr. William Minor.

name: This Is England
summary_text: A young boy becomes friends with a gang of skinheads. Friends soon become like family, and relationships will be pushed to the very limit.

name: The A-Team
summary_text: Four Vietnam vets, framed for a crime they didn't commit, help the innocent while on the run from the military.

name: Brave New World
summary_text: In a utopia whose perfection hinges upon control of monogamy and privacy, members of the collective begin to question the rules, putting their regimented society on a collision course with forbidden love and revolution.

name: Grave of the Fireflies
summary_text: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

name: The Protege
summary_text: Rescued as a child by the legendary assassin Moody (Samuel L. Jackson) and trained in the family business, Anna (Maggie Q) is the world's most skilled contract killer. But when Moody - the ...                See full summary »

name: Click
summary_text: A workaholic architect finds a universal remote that allows him to fast-forward and rewind to different parts of his life. Complications arise when the remote starts to overrule his choices.

name: GoldenEye
summary_text: Years after a friend and fellow 00 agent is killed on a joint mission, a secret space based weapons program known as "GoldenEye" is stolen. James Bond sets out to stop a Russian crime syndicate from using the weapon.

name: Thelma & Louise
summary_text: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two girls escape for the crimes they committed.

name: Road House
summary_text: A tough bouncer is hired to tame a dirty bar.

name: Real Steel
summary_text: In the near future, robot boxing is a top sport. A struggling ex-boxer feels he's found a champion in a discarded robot.

name: Halloween
summary_text: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.

name: Dark Desire
summary_text: Married Alma spends a fateful weekend away from home that ignites passion, ends in tragedy, and leads her to question the truth about those close to her.

name: Numb3rs
summary_text: Working for the F.B.I., a mathematician uses equations to help solve various crimes.

name: Eastbound & Down
summary_text: Many years after he turned his back on his hometown, a burned-out major league ballplayer returns to teach Physical Education at his old middle school.

name: Annie
summary_text: A spunky young orphan is taken in by a rich eccentric, much to the chagrin of the cantankerous woman who runs the orphanage.

name: American Horror Stories
summary_text: Spinoff series of 'American Horror Story'.

name: The Ritual
summary_text: A group of old college friends reunite for a trip to a forest in Sweden, Eastern Europe, but encounter a menacing presence there stalking them.

name: Madagascar
summary_text: A group of animals who have spent all their life in a New York zoo end up in the jungles of Madagascar, and must adjust to living in the wild.

name: Body Heat
summary_text: In the midst of a searing Florida heat wave, a woman persuades her lover, a small-town lawyer, to murder her rich husband.

name: 10 Cloverfield Lane
summary_text: After getting in a car accident, a woman is held in a shelter by a man who claims that the outside world is affected by a widespread chemical attack.

name: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
summary_text: The infamous story of Benjamin Barker, aka Sweeney Todd, who sets up a barber shop in London which is the basis for a sinister partnership with his fellow tenant, Mrs. Lovett.

name: In the Heat of the Night
summary_text: The cases and adventures of the police forces in and around Sparta, Mississippi.

name: Grantchester
summary_text: A Cambridgeshire clergyman finds himself investigating a series of mysterious wrongdoings in his small village of Grantchester.

name: The Pacifier
summary_text: Having recovered from wounds received in a failed rescue operation, Navy SEAL Shane Wolfe is handed a new assignment: Protect the five Plummer kids from enemies of their recently deceased father -- a government scientist whose top-secret experiment remains in the kids' house.

name: Easy
summary_text: Intertwined groups of friends in Chicago fumble through the modern maze of love, sex, technology and culture.

name: Pokémon
summary_text: Ash Ketchum, his yellow pet Pikachu, and his human friends explore a world of powerful creatures.

name: Beauty and the Beast
summary_text: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

name: The Midnight Sky
summary_text: This post-apocalyptic tale follows Augustine, a lonely scientist in the Arctic, as he races to stop Sully and her fellow astronauts from returning home to a mysterious global catastrophe.

name: CHiPs
summary_text: The adventures of two California Highway Patrol motorcycle officers.

name: Offspring
summary_text: The story of the impossible loves of 30-something obstetrician Nina Proudman and her fabulously messy family.

name: Career Opportunities
summary_text: Jim is the dorky son of a local cement contractor who lives at home and has no direction. Josie is the gorgeous daughter of a wealthy businessman who dreams of leaving town. They find they have a lot in common.

name: Into the Dark
summary_text: A horror anthology series with each episode inspired by a holiday.

name: Fierce Creatures
summary_text: Zookeepers struggle to deal with the policies of changing directors.

name: Misery
summary_text: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

name: Creed
summary_text: The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.

name: Monsters University
summary_text: A look at the relationship between Mike Wazowski (Billy Crystal) and James P. "Sully" Sullivan (John Goodman) during their days at Monsters University, when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.

name: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
summary_text: Jack Reacher must uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy in order to clear his name while on the run as a fugitive from the law.

name: Batman
summary_text: The Caped Crusader and his young ward battle evildoers in Gotham City.

name: Knight and Day
summary_text: A young woman gets mixed up with a disgraced spy who is trying to clear his name.

name: Shin seiki evangerion
summary_text: A teenage boy finds himself recruited as a member of an elite team of pilots by his father.

name: Sixteen Candles
summary_text: A girl's "sweet" sixteenth birthday becomes anything but special, as she suffers from every embarrassment possible.

name: The Abyss
summary_text: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and faces danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

name: Company of Heroes
summary_text: American soldiers lost behind enemy lines during the WWII make a horrific discovery: Hitler has a super bomb in development. Against all odds, they set out to find the scientist in charge of the program who is looking to defect.

name: Absentia
summary_text: After being declared dead in absentia, an FBI agent must reclaim her family, identity and innocence when she finds herself the prime suspect in a string of murders.

name: Unforgettable
summary_text: Carrie Wells, a former police detective, has a rare ability to remember virtually everything she experiences including detailed visual recall. She returns to police work and uses her ability to solve crimes.

name: Re: Zero, Starting Life in Another World
summary_text: Shortly after being summoned to a new world, Subaru Natsuki and his new female companion are brutally murdered. But then he awakes to find himself in the same alley, with the same thugs, the same girl, and the day begins to repeat.

name: Sex and the City
summary_text: A New York City writer on sex and love is finally getting married to her Mr. Big. But her three best girlfriends must console her after one of them inadvertently leads Mr. Big to jilt her.

name: Planet of the Apes
summary_text: An astronaut crew crash-lands on a planet in the distant future where intelligent talking apes are the dominant species, and humans are the oppressed and enslaved.

name: DC League of Super-Pets
summary_text: Superman's dog team up with a flying cat to stop crime while Superman is on vacation.

name: The A-Team
summary_text: A group of Iraq War veterans look to clear their name with the U.S. Military, who suspect the four men of committing a crime for which they were framed.

name: Enemy
summary_text: A man seeks out his exact look-alike after spotting him in a movie.

name: Sky High
summary_text: Set in an era where superheroes are commonly known and accepted, young William Stronghold, the son of the Commander and Jetstream, tries to find a balance between being a normal teenager and an extraordinary being.

name: Pokémon Detective Pikachu
summary_text: In a world where people collect Pokémon to do battle, a boy comes across an intelligent talking Pikachu who seeks to be a detective.

name: In the Dark
summary_text: A blind young woman tries to solve her friend's murder.

name: Counterpart
summary_text: A hapless UN employee discovers that the agency he works for is hiding a gateway to a parallel dimension that's in a cold war with our own, and where his other self is a top spy. The war slowly heats up thanks to spies from both sides.

name: Body of Proof
summary_text: Medical examiner Megan Hunt's unique approach to solving crimes puts her at odds with her superiors.

name: The Dark Tower
summary_text: A boy haunted by visions of a dark tower from a parallel reality teams up with the tower's disillusioned guardian to stop an evil warlock known as the Man in Black who plans to use the boy to destroy the tower and open the gates of Hell.

name: Antlers
summary_text: In an isolated Oregon town, a middle-school teacher and her sheriff brother become embroiled with her enigmatic student, whose dark secrets lead to terrifying encounters with a legendary ancestral creature who came before them.

name: Hollywood
summary_text: A group of aspiring actors and filmmakers in post-World War II Hollywood try to make it big - no matter the cost.

name: Hunter Killer
summary_text: An untested American submarine captain teams with U.S. Navy Seals to rescue the Russian president, who has been kidnapped by a rogue general.

name: Inspector Morse
summary_text: Chief Inspector Morse has an ear for music, a taste for beer and a nose for crime. He sets out with Detective Sergeant Lewis to solve each intriguing case.

name: Election
summary_text: A high school teacher meets his match in an over-achieving student politician.

name: Rampage
summary_text: When three different animals become infected with a dangerous pathogen, a primatologist and a geneticist team up to stop them from destroying Chicago.

name: Keeping Faith
summary_text: Faith, a small-town Welsh lawyer, is forced to cut short her extended maternity leave when her husband and business partner, Evan, goes missing. As the truth of his actions surface, Faith must fight to protect her family and her sanity.

name: The Mummy Returns
summary_text: The mummified body of Imhotep is shipped to a museum in London, where he once again wakes and begins his campaign of rage and terror.

name: Gamer
summary_text: In a future mind-controlling game, death row convicts are forced to battle in a 'Doom'-type environment. Convict Kable, controlled by Simon, a skilled teenage gamer, must survive thirty sessions in order to be set free.

name: H2O: Just Add Water
summary_text: Three girls become mermaids after a mysterious island transforms them and gives them special powers.

name: Escape Plan
summary_text: When a structural-security authority finds himself set up and incarcerated in the world's most secret and secure prison, he has to use his skills to escape with help from the inside.

name: Lion
summary_text: A five-year-old Indian boy is adopted by an Australian couple after getting lost hundreds of kilometers from home. 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.

name: Creed II
summary_text: Under the tutelage of Rocky Balboa, newly crowned heavyweight champion Adonis Creed faces off against Viktor Drago, the son of Ivan Drago.

name: Boyhood
summary_text: The life of Mason, from early childhood to his arrival at college.

name: Super 8
summary_text: During the summer of 1979, a group of friends witness a train crash and investigate subsequent unexplained events in their small town.

name: The Brady Bunch
summary_text: The misadventures of a large family united when a widower and a widow marry.

name: She's All That
summary_text: A high school jock makes a bet that he can turn an unattractive girl into the school's prom queen.

name: Sex Drive
summary_text: A high school senior drives cross-country with his best friends to hook up with a babe he met online.

name: Coroner
summary_text: A newly appointed coroner investigates a string of mysterious deaths in Toronto.

name: Selena: The Series
summary_text: Late Tejano singer Selena as her dreams come true, and her family makes life-changing choices on the singer's journey to success.

name: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
summary_text: Ron Burgundy is San Diego's top-rated newsman in the male-dominated broadcasting of the 1970s, but that's all about to change for Ron and his cronies when an ambitious woman is hired as a new anchor.

name: The Human Centipede (First Sequence)
summary_text: A mad scientist kidnaps and mutilates a trio of tourists in order to reassemble them into a human centipede, created by stitching their mouths to each others' rectums.

name: Timeless
summary_text: An unlikely trio travel through time in order to battle unknown criminals and protect history as we know it.

name: Gaia
summary_text: An injured forest ranger on a routine mission is saved by two off-the-grid survivalists. What is initially a welcome rescue grows more suspicious as the son and his renegade father reveal a cultish devotion to the forest.

name: Planet of the Apes
summary_text: In 2029, an Air Force astronaut crash-lands on a mysterious planet where evolved, talking apes dominate a race of primitive humans.

name: Nacho Libre
summary_text: Berated all his life by those around him, a monk follows his dream and dons a mask to moonlight as a Luchador (Mexican wrestler).

name: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
summary_text: Two friends on a summer holiday in Spain become enamored with the same painter, unaware that his ex-wife, with whom he has a tempestuous relationship, is about to re-enter the picture.

name: Songbird
summary_text: In 2024 a pandemic ravages the world and its cities. Centering on a handful of people as they navigate the obstacles currently hindering society: disease, martial law, quarantine, and vigilantes.

name: Richard Jewell
summary_text: Security guard Richard Jewell is an instant hero after foiling a bomb attack at the 1996 Atlanta Olympics, but his life becomes a nightmare when the FBI leaks to the media that he is a suspect in the case.

name: Focus
summary_text: In the midst of veteran con man Nicky's latest scheme, a woman from his past - now an accomplished femme fatale - shows up and throws his plans for a loop.

name: Don't Toy with Me, Miss Nagatoro
summary_text: High schooler Hayase Nagatoro loves to spend her free time doing one thing, and that is to bully her Senpai. After Nagatoro and her friends stumble upon the aspiring artist's drawings, they...                See full summary »

name: The Beach
summary_text: On vacation in Thailand, Richard sets out for an island rumored to be a solitary beach paradise.

name: Encanto
summary_text: A young Colombian girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

name: Law School
summary_text: When a grim incident occurs at their prestigious school, justice through law is put to a test by a tough law professor and his ambitious students.

name: Magnolia
summary_text: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

name: Blow
summary_text: The story of how George Jung, along with the Medellín Cartel headed by Pablo Escobar, established the American cocaine market in the 1970s in the United States.

name: Chesapeake Shores
summary_text: A young woman returns to her hometown to help save her sister's failing inn, where she contends with memories and faces from her past.

name: Changeling
summary_text: Grief-stricken mother Christine Collins (Angelina Jolie) takes on the L.A.P.D. to her own detriment when it tries to pass off an obvious impostor as her missing child.

name: Gummo
summary_text: Lonely residents of a tornado-stricken Ohio town wander the deserted landscape trying to fulfill their boring, nihilistic lives.

name: 50 First Dates
summary_text: Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams until discovering she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the next day.

name: The Next Three Days
summary_text: A married couple's life is turned upside down when the wife is accused of a murder.

name: Fuller House
summary_text: In a continuation of Full House (1987), D.J. Fuller is a mother of three young boys and is a recent widow. D.J.'s sister Stephanie, her best friend Kimmy and Kimmy's teenage daughter all move in to help raise her sons. The house is now a lot fuller.

name: The Sandman
summary_text: Upon escaping after decades of imprisonment by a mortal wizard, Dream, the personification of dreams, sets about to reclaim his lost equipment.

name: Julie and the Phantoms
summary_text: Julie is a teenage girl who finds her passion for music and life with the help of a high -concept band of teen boys (The Phantoms) who have been dead for 25 years. Julie, in turn, helps them become the band they were never able to be.

name: Final Destination
summary_text: Alex Browning is among a group of high school students readying themselves for a trip to Europe. When he suddenly has a premonition their airplane will crash, he screams to warn the others but instead he is thrown off of the plane.

name: The Edge of Seventeen
summary_text: High-school life gets even more unbearable for Nadine when her best friend, Krista, starts dating her older brother.

name: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
summary_text: 11-year-old Nicky, Ricky, Dicky, and Dawn Harper's sibling rivalry are heightened by the fact that they are quadruplets.

name: A Silent Voice: The Movie
summary_text: A young man is ostracized by his classmates after he bullies a deaf girl to the point where she moves away. Years later, he sets off on a path for redemption.

name: Paul
summary_text: Two English comic book geeks traveling across the U.S. encounter an alien outside Area 51.

name: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
summary_text: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

name: Get Smart
summary_text: Maxwell Smart, a highly intellectual but bumbling spy working for the CONTROL agency, is tasked with preventing a terrorist attack from rival spy agency KAOS.

name: My Fair Lady
summary_text: Snobbish phonetics Professor Henry Higgins agrees to a wager that he can make flower girl Eliza Doolittle presentable in high society.

name: Nip/Tuck
summary_text: The dark and twisted trials of two plastic surgeons.

name: Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
summary_text: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline-rich community escape a horde of bandits.

name: Swordfish
summary_text: A covert counter-terrorist unit called Black Cell led by Gabriel Shear wants the money to help finance their war against international terrorism, but it's all locked away. Gabriel brings in convicted hacker Stanley Jobson to help him.

name: Forbrydelsen
summary_text: Police detective Sarah Lund investigates difficult cases with personal and political consequences.

name: Falling Skies
summary_text: Survivors of an alien attack on earth gather together to fight for their lives and fight back.

name: The Rental
summary_text: Two couples rent a vacation home for what should be a celebratory weekend get-away.

name: Triple Frontier
summary_text: Loyalties are tested when five friends and former special forces operatives reunite to take down a South American drug lord, unleashing a chain of unintended consequences.

name: Domestic Disturbance
summary_text: When Danny witnesses his stepfather Rick murder a man, Danny's father Frank has to protect his son from the greatest danger.

name: John Carter
summary_text: Transported to Barsoom, a Civil War vet discovers a barren planet seemingly inhabited by 12-foot tall barbarians. Finding himself prisoner of these creatures, he escapes, only to encounter Woola and a princess in desperate need of a savior.

name: Den of Thieves
summary_text: An elite unit of the LA County Sheriff's Dept. and the state's most successful bank robbery crew clash as the outlaws plan a seemingly impossible heist on the Federal Reserve Bank.

name: Silk Stockings
summary_text: A musical remake of Ninotchka: After three bumbling Soviet agents fail in their mission to retrieve a straying Soviet composer from Paris, the beautiful, ultra-serious Ninotchka is sent to ...                See full summary »

name: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
summary_text: In 15th-century France, a gypsy girl is framed for murder by the infatuated Chief Justice, and only the deformed bellringer of Notre Dame Cathedral can save her.

name: Borat Subsequent Moviefilm
summary_text: Borat returns from Kazakhstan to America and this time he reveals more about the American culture, the COVID-19 pandemic and the political elections.

name: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent
summary_text: A cash-strapped Nicolas Cage agrees to make a paid appearance at a billionaire super fan's birthday party, but is really an informant for the CIA since the billionaire fan is a drug kingpin and gets cast in a Tarantino movie.

name: Mars Attacks!
summary_text: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

name: Runaways
summary_text: After discovering their parents are super-villains in disguise, a group of teenagers band together to run away from their homes in order to atone for their parents' actions and to discover the secrets of their origins.

name: Crash
summary_text: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

name: John Tucker Must Die
summary_text: Three ex-girlfriends of a serial cheater set up their former lover to fall for the new girl in town so they can watch him get his heart broken.

name: Barbarians
summary_text: The famous battle of the Teutoburg Forest, in which Germanic warriors united by a strong woman, halted the northward advance of the Roman Empire in AD 9.

name: A Knight's Tale
summary_text: After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight.

name: Das Boot
summary_text: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.

name: Fear
summary_text: When Nicole met David; handsome, charming, affectionate, he was everything. It seemed perfect, but soon she sees that David has a darker side. And his adoration turns to obsession, their dream into a nightmare, and her love into fear.

name: Pitch Perfect 2
summary_text: After a humiliating command performance at The Kennedy Center, the Barden Bellas enter an international competition that no American group has ever won in order to regain their status and right to perform.

name: The Fly
summary_text: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

name: Boyz n the Hood
summary_text: Follows the lives of three young males living in the Crenshaw ghetto of Los Angeles, dissecting questions of race, relationships, violence, and future prospects.

name: Men in Black 3
summary_text: Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.

name: Every Breath You Take
summary_text: A psychiatrist, whose client commits suicide, finds his family life disrupted after introducing her surviving brother to his wife and daughter.

name: The Secret Life of Pets 2
summary_text: Continuing the story of Max and his pet friends, following their secret lives after their owners leave them for work or school each day.

name: The Covenant
summary_text: Four young men who belong to a New England supernatural legacy are forced to battle a fifth power long thought to have died out. Meanwhile, jealousy and suspicion threaten to tear them apart.

name: Do the Right Thing
summary_text: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.

name: The Call
summary_text: Two people live in different times. Seo-Yeon lives in the present and Young-Sook lives in the past. One phone call connects the two, and their lives are changed irrevocably.

name: The Thin Red Line
summary_text: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

name: Source Code
summary_text: A soldier wakes up in someone else's body and discovers he's part of an experimental government program to find the bomber of a commuter train within 8 minutes.

name: The Purge
summary_text: Set in an altered United States, several unrelated people discover how far they will go to survive a night where all crime is legal for 12 hours.

name: Luke Cage
summary_text: When a sabotaged experiment gives him super strength and unbreakable skin, Luke Cage becomes a fugitive attempting to rebuild his life in Harlem and must soon confront his past and fight a battle for the heart of his city.

name: Crash
summary_text: After getting into a serious car accident, a TV director discovers an underground sub-culture of scarred, omnisexual car-crash victims who use car accidents and the raw sexual energy they produce to try to rejuvenate his sex life with his wife.

name: The Bronze
summary_text: A foul-mouthed former gymnastics bronze medalist with local celebrity status reluctantly trains a rising Olympics aspirant.

name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
summary_text: Katniss Everdeen is in District 13 after she shatters the games forever. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss spreads her wings as she fights to save Peeta and a nation moved by her courage.

name: Eden Lake
summary_text: Refusing to let anything spoil their romantic weekend break, a young couple confront a gang of loutish youths with terrifyingly brutal consequences.

name: Wild Mountain Thyme
summary_text: A pair of star-crossed lovers in Ireland get caught up in their family's land dispute.

name: Sex and Zen
summary_text: A man marries a beautiful wife, but decides to go out and experience as many sexual conquests as possible, with unusual and often hilarious results. Meanwhile, his wife is forced to enter a brothel and work as a prostitute.

name: Pitch Perfect 3
summary_text: Following their win at the world championship, the now separated Bellas reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour, but face a group who uses both instruments and voices.

name: Lightyear
summary_text: The story of Buzz Lightyear and his adventures to infinity and beyond.

name: The Hangover Part II
summary_text: Two years after the bachelor party in Las Vegas, Phil, Stu, Alan, and Doug jet to Thailand for Stu's wedding. Stu's plan for a subdued pre-wedding brunch, however, goes seriously awry.

name: Lost City of D
summary_text: A reclusive romance novelist on a book tour with her cover model gets swept up in kidnapping attempt that lands them them both in a cutthroat jungle adventure.

name: Phineas and Ferb
summary_text: Phineas and Ferb invent, scheme, and stay one step ahead of their bratty sister. Meanwhile, their pet platypus plots against evil Dr. Doofenshmirtz.

name: It's Okay to Not Be Okay
summary_text: An extraordinary road to emotional healing opens up for an selfish antisocial children's book writer and a selfless psych ward caretaker when they cross paths.

name: Limelight
summary_text: A fading comedian and a suicidally despondent ballet dancer must look to each other to find purpose and hope in their lives.

name: Broad City
summary_text: Broad City follows two women throughout their daily lives in New York City, making the smallest and mundane events hysterical and disturbing to watch all at the same time.

name: The Northman
summary_text: From acclaimed director Robert Eggers, The Northman is an epic revenge thriller that explores how far a Viking prince will go to seek justice for his murdered father.

name: Transformers: Age of Extinction
summary_text: When humanity allies with a bounty hunter in pursuit of Optimus Prime, the Autobots turn to a mechanic and his family for help.

name: Sing 2
summary_text: Buster Moon and his friends must persuade reclusive rock star Clay Calloway to join them for the opening of a new show.

name: American Honey
summary_text: A teenage girl with nothing to lose joins a traveling magazine sales crew, and gets caught up in a whirlwind of hard partying, law bending and young love as she criss-crosses the Midwest with a band of misfits.

name: Wij
summary_text: Eight teens - four guys and four girls - are the best of friends. One summer, out of boredom they experiment with all manner of new means to entertain themselves. This degenerates into some extreme behaviour and will lead to tragedy.

name: The Celebrity Dating Game
summary_text: A spin on the classic dating show with a roster of celebrity singles in their pursuit to find love.

name: Creepshow
summary_text: The fictional Creepshow comic books come to life in this anthology series of terrifying tales hosted by the silent Creepshow ghoul.

name: Ghost Ship
summary_text: A salvage crew discovers a long-lost 1962 passenger ship floating lifeless in a remote region of the Bering Sea, and soon notices that its long-dead inhabitants may still be on board.

name: PEN15
summary_text: The comedic story of middle school seen through the eyes of two 7th grade girls dealing with the awkwardness of being a teenager.

name: Can't Hardly Wait
summary_text: A complete graduating class, consisting of beautiful girls, geeks and promising footballers, assemble at a rich classmate's residence for a party. Interesting developments follow at the get-together.

name: You Had Me at Aloha
summary_text: Paige and Ben become the new co-hosts of a popular travel show set in Hawaii. As they clash over ideas, they grapple with the fact that not only do they need each other to further their ...                See full summary »

name: Terminator Genisys
summary_text: When John Connor, leader of the human resistance, sends Sgt. Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect Sarah Connor and safeguard the future, an unexpected turn of events creates a fractured timeline.

name: Super Mario Bros.
summary_text: Two Brooklyn plumbers, Mario and Luigi, must travel to another dimension to rescue a princess from the evil dictator King Koopa and stop him from taking over the world.

name: Soccer Mom Madam
summary_text: After a bitter breakup leaves her and her young children without any support, Anna goes to work for her cousin at a massage parlour known for "happy endings." As soon as she learns the ropes, Anna branches out on her own.

name: Antichrist
summary_text: A grieving couple retreat to their cabin in the woods, hoping to repair their broken hearts and troubled marriage, but nature takes its course and things go from bad to worse.

name: Hinterland
summary_text: A noir crime drama set in Aberystwyth, Wales, where troubled DCI Tom Mathias solves murders while searching for redemption.

name: Profile
summary_text: An undercover British journalist infiltrates the online propaganda channels of the so-called Islamic State, only to be sucked in by her recruiter.

name: Porky's
summary_text: In 1954, a group of Florida high-school guys try to help their buddy lose his virginity, which leads them to seek revenge on a sleazy nightclub owner and his redneck sheriff brother for harassing them.

name: Nightmare Alley
summary_text: An ambitious carny with a talent for manipulating people with a few well-chosen words hooks up with a female psychiatrist who is even more dangerous than he is.

name: Frontier
summary_text: Follows Declan Harp, a half-Irish/half Cree Native-Canadian outlaw who is campaigning to breach the Hudson's Bay Company's monopoly on the fur trade in Canada.

name: The Sting
summary_text: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

name: Overlord
summary_text: A small group of American soldiers find horror behind enemy lines on the eve of D-Day.

name: Rent
summary_text: This is the film version of the Pulitzer and Tony Award winning musical about Bohemians in the East Village of New York City struggling with life, love and AIDS, and the impacts they have on America.

name: The Proposal
summary_text: A pushy boss forces her young assistant to marry her in order to keep her visa status in the U.S. and avoid deportation to Canada.

name: Level 16
summary_text: In a highly regimented boarding school, a pair of students discover that things are not as they seem.

name: Skylines
summary_text: When a virus threatens to turn the now earth-dwelling friendly alien hybrids against humans, Captain Rose Corley must lead a team of elite mercenaries on a mission to the alien world in order to save what's left of humanity.

name: NCIS: Hawai'i
summary_text: Follow a team of Naval criminal investigators who operate on the Hawaiian islands.

name: The Quiet Man
summary_text: A retired American boxer returns to the village of his birth in Ireland, where he falls for a spirited redhead whose brother is contemptuous of their union.

name: Max Anger - With One Eye Open
summary_text: Max Anger is a former member of the Swedish military who finally found love with his Russian colleague Pashie. When she suddenly goes missing in St Petersburg, Max sets off on a mission to find her but soon finds himself on a deadly hunt.

name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
summary_text: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

name: Daybreak
summary_text: High school outcast Josh is searching for his missing girlfriend in post apocalyptic Glendale. He's joined by a group of misfits Angelica and his former bully Wesley. On the way they'll face many weird things.

name: Fractured
summary_text: A couple stops at a gas station, where their 6 y.o. daughter's arm is fractured. They hurry to a hospital. Something strange is going on there. The wife and daughter go missing.

name: Molly's Game
summary_text: The true story of Molly Bloom, an Olympic-class skier who ran the world's most exclusive high-stakes poker game and became an FBI target.

name: Dick Tracy
summary_text: The comic strip detective finds his life vastly complicated when Breathless Mahoney makes advances towards him while he is trying to battle Big Boy Caprice's united mob.

name: 12 Monkeys
summary_text: Follows the journey of a time traveler from the post-apocalyptic future who appears in present day on a mission to locate and eradicate the source of a deadly plague that will nearly destroy the human race.

name: The Craft
summary_text: A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft, and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who anger them.

name: 28 Weeks Later
summary_text: Six months after the rage virus was inflicted on the population of Great Britain, the US Army helps to secure a small area of London for the survivors to repopulate and start again. But not everything goes according to plan.

name: Queer as Folk
summary_text: The lives and loves of a group of gay friends living in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: Now You See Me 2
summary_text: The Four Horsemen resurface, and are forcibly recruited by a tech genius to pull off their most impossible heist yet.

name: Cinema Paradiso
summary_text: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

name: Il commissario Montalbano
summary_text: Detective Montalbano solves crimes in Sicily.

name: The Dukes of Hazzard
summary_text: The adventures of the fast-drivin', rubber-burnin' Duke boys of Hazzard County.

name: Special OPS
summary_text: The story through the eyes of Himmat Singh is based on the inspiration was taken from Nineteen Years of nationally significant events, several espionage missions were undertaken by India in the last two decades.

name: The Seventh Day
summary_text: A renowned exorcist who teams up with a rookie priest for his first day of training. As they plunge deeper into hell on earth, the lines between good and evil blur, and their own demons emerge.

name: The Other Guys
summary_text: Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up like the city's top cops, whom they idolize, only things don't quite go as planned.

name: Working Girl
summary_text: When a secretary's idea is stolen by her boss, she seizes an opportunity to steal it back by pretending she has her boss' job.

name: McLeod's Daughters
summary_text: Five women run a cattle station, "Drover's Run", in the outback of South Australia.

name: Young Justice
summary_text: Teenage superheroes strive to prove themselves as members of the Justice League.

name: Bright
summary_text: A detective must work with an Orc to find a powerful wand before evil creatures do.

name: The Last Hour
summary_text: A mysterious young shaman, on the run protecting a secret gift, joins hands with a seasoned city cop to hunt down a dangerous figure from his dark past. But when he falls for the cop's young daughter, he is torn between duty and love.

name: The Theory of Everything
summary_text: A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.

name: Berserk
summary_text: Guts is a skilled swordsman who joins forces with a mercenary group named 'The Band of the Hawk', lead by the charismatic Griffith, and fights with them as they battle their way into the royal court.

name: The Village
summary_text: A series of events tests the beliefs of a small isolated countryside village.

name: The Guernsey Literary and Potato Peel Pie Society
summary_text: In the aftermath of World War II, a writer forms an unexpected bond with the residents of Guernsey Island when she decides to write a book about their experiences during the war.

name: Lawrence of Arabia
summary_text: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

name: Crocodile Dundee
summary_text: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

name: Maleficent: Mistress of Evil
summary_text: Maleficent and her goddaughter Aurora begin to question the complex family ties that bind them as they are pulled in different directions by impending nuptials, unexpected allies and dark new forces at play.

name: Candyman
summary_text: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.

name: Hostiles
summary_text: In 1892, a legendary Army Captain reluctantly agrees to escort a Cheyenne chief and his family through dangerous territory.

name: The Young and the Restless
summary_text: Set in Genoa City, this is the long-running soap that tells the story of the struggle behind the business, and sex-savvy Abbott and Newman clans.

name: Ghost
summary_text: After a young man is murdered, his spirit stays behind to warn his lover of impending danger, with the help of a reluctant psychic.

name: Lights Out
summary_text: Rebecca must unlock the terror behind her little brother's experiences that once tested her sanity, bringing her face to face with a supernatural spirit attached to their mother.

name: Bad Boys
summary_text: Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct.

name: Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse
summary_text: Three scouts, on the eve of their last camp-out, discover the true meaning of friendship when they attempt to save their town from a zombie outbreak.

name: Billy Madison
summary_text: In order to inherit his fed up father's hotel empire, an immature and lazy man must repeat grades 1-12 all over again.

name: Monsters
summary_text: Six years after Earth has suffered an alien invasion, a cynical journalist agrees to escort a shaken American tourist through an infected zone in Mexico to the safety of the U.S. border.

name: JFK
summary_text: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

name: Fried Green Tomatoes
summary_text: A housewife who is unhappy with her life befriends an old lady in a nursing home and is enthralled by the tales she tells of people she used to know.

name: The Last Dance
summary_text: Charting the rise of the 1990's Chicago Bulls, led by Michael Jordan, one of the most notable dynasties in sports history.

name: The Great Escape
summary_text: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

name: Pretty in Pink
summary_text: A poor girl must choose between the affections of dating her childhood sweetheart or a rich but sensitive playboy.

name: Vis a vis
summary_text: She broke the law for the boss she fell in love with. Now this naive girl has to pay the price.

name: Risky Business
summary_text: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand.

name: Gravity
summary_text: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.
